actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To provide for a community health center for medically underserved populations in the northeastern portion of the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for the planning, development, and operation of a community health center in the vicinity of Youngstown and Warren, Ohio.

titles.title: To provide for a community health center for medically underserved populations in the northeastern portion of the State of Ohio.
